interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AIFAIFA 9Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set, Burgundy Nail Polish Kits Red Colors Soak Off UV/LED Nail Polish Set, Gel Polish with Base Coat & Glossy & Matte Top All-Season Salon Manicure Art Design Red
Review Date: 2022/03/06
Store: AIFAIFA
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Burgundy,Red', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Unit Count': '9.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.21 x 2.83 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a nice set of gel polishes. Some of the colors aren't close to the colors in the sellers photos, but they are still nice. The opaque colors looked pretty good with just one coat, but I used two coats. The glitter swatches have two coats on as well. The matte top coat has a very strong smell, but seems to work really well. The regular top coat cures to a shiny finish and seems good too. All of the layers cured in two minutes each with my lamp.
Review Title: Nice set of reds/pinks. Good coverage.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Rosalind Neon Nail Polish Set,Classic Neon Color Series Soak Off UV LED Lamp,Soak Off UV/LED (Neon Color Series)
nonbranded
{'Brand': 'nonbranded', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '24.00 Count', 'Liquid Volume': '0.33 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 10.51 x 3.7 inches; 2.23 Pounds'}
I did my test swatches and most of the colors are a close match to what they show. A few are way off, but still pretty colors. All of my swatches are two coats. The only issue I had was with the black, which isn't shown in my photos. Even after at least 5 minutes, I couldn't get the color to cure. The bottles seem to be pretty full and none are goopy or thick. Although there are quite a few reds and pinks, it's still a good selection, especially for the price.
Good set of gel polishes at a great price!
AIFAIFA 9Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set, Burgundy Nail Polish Kits Red Colors Soak Off UV/LED Nail Polish Set, Gel Polish with Base Coat & Glossy & Matte Top All-Season Salon Manicure Art Design Red
AIFAIFA
{'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Burgundy,Red', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Unit Count': '9.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.21 x 2.83 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
This is a nice set of gel polishes. Some of the colors aren't close to the colors in the sellers photos, but they are still nice. The opaque colors looked pretty good with just one coat, but I used two coats. The glitter swatches have two coats on as well. The matte top coat has a very strong smell, but seems to work really well. The regular top coat cures to a shiny finish and seems good too. All of the layers cured in two minutes each with my lamp.
Nice set of reds/pinks. Good coverage.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys a variety of nail polish colors, particularly vibrant shades such as red and burgundy, reflecting a preference for bold hues. 
- **Formulation Insight:** Favors gel nail products with glossy and matte finishes, indicating flexibility in preferred finish types. 
- **Quality Expectations:** Values closely matching colors to product displays but has noted some discrepancies in this area. Appreciates good coverage, often achieving satisfactory results with fewer coats.
- **Experience Level:** Intermediate user, capable of performing swatches and evaluating application results; comfortable with layering techniques.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Seeks value for money, favoring affordable options that still deliver solid performance without significant compromises in quality.
- **Curing Performance:** Expects effective curing times, finding success with typical two-minute cures across various layers, including base and top coats.
- **Visual Appeal:** Prioritizes aesthetic qualities in nail art products and enjoys experimenting with designs, especially those that involve a variety of shades and finishes.

Overall, the user emphasizes finding well-priced products that offer a wide color selection, reliable performance in application and curing, and aesthetic versatility, particularly with glossy and matte options.
